semantic_title: Timing for Use of Code O94 After Initial Postpartum Period
section_path: Section I > C. Chapter-Specific Coding Guidelines > 15. Chapter 15: Pregnancy, Childbirth, and the Puerperium > p. Code O94, Sequelae of complication of pregnancy, childbirth, and the puerperium > 2) After the initial postpartum period

content.full_text: This code may be used at any time after the initial postpartum period. (Evidence: pg no: 70, L37)
content.summary: Code O94 can be used at any time following the initial postpartum period. (Evidence: pg no: 70, L37)
key_concepts: Timing flexibility after postpartum period (Evidence: pg no: 70, L37)
No time limit for sequelae coding (Evidence: pg no: 70, L37)

detailed_rules.rule_text: O94 may be used at any time after initial postpartum period (Evidence: pg no: 70, L37)
detailed_rules.explanation: There is no time restriction on when O94 can be used, as long as it is after the initial postpartum period (Evidence: pg no: 70, L37)
common_applications: Years after delivery for ongoing sequelae

workflow_steps: Step 1: Confirm initial postpartum period has ended
Step 3: Apply O94 code regardless of time elapsed
